channel.title: How to change npc max hp 317 pi
channel.description:
HEy there i am relitivley new to coding and i want to change the npc's hp but when i change it to e.g 9999 the maximum hp for that npc is 120. so i was wondering how do u change the npc's maximum hp
here is the line
npc = 20 Paladin 999 999

o ye sorry i forgot to say i am using 317 pi

item.title: How to change npc max hp 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Well you are using delta by the looks of it so you open Npc.cfg in the Config folder.

Then you search for this:

Okay let me help you.

The 20 is the NPC ID.
The 62 is the Combat level (You can’t change it even if you increase it).
The 500 is the health.
The 10 is the respawn.

So you would make yours
